snippet: A new technique surpassed standard testing in detecting chromosomal abnormalities that can cause problems like autism or mental retardation.
abstract: Researchers say a new method of prenatal testing surpasses standard testing in detecting chromosomal abnormalities that can cause problems like autism or mental retardation.
lead_paragraph: A new technique surpassed standard testing in detecting chromosomal abnormalities that can cause problems like autism or mental retardation.

headline.seo: Clinical Trial Yields Positive Results for New Prenatal Test
headline.main: Clinical Trial Is Favorable for a Prenatal Gene Test
headline.print_headline: Clinical Trial Is Favorable For a Prenatal Gene Test
